pkgmetadata.longdescription: Change Point Tests for Joint Distributions and Copulas // Change point tests for joint distributions and copulas using pseudo- observations with multipliers or bootstrap. The processes used here have been defined in Bucher, Kojadinovic, Rohmer Segers doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2014.07.012 and Nasri Remillard doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2019.03.002.
